ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 02:26:05. [Issue ID 2294931]
ComicInfo.Summary:
An all-new comic book adaptation of F. Scott Fitzgerald's classic novel, The Great Gatsby. Adapted by Ted Adams (The Island of Doctor Moreau) and illustrated by Jorge Coelho (Loki, Rocket Raccoon).
In this third issue of the faithful adaptation, we learn more about Gatsby's shady past and the man who fixed baseball's World Series in 1919.
"It's a great advantage not to drink among hard drinking people." - F. Scott Fitzgerald
